channel.title: Environmental variables
channel.description: Well i have just realized my computer is set up in Spanish, so for this reason, i feel like this is the reason my classpath and path did not work, since i believe the English words do not work for it, like PROGRAM FILES, is named Archivos de programa in Spanish, so could this be the reason why my compiler wont work? and because the compiler is set up to look for C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; not C:\Archivos de programa\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; ? idk if sum1 knows about this, but if u do, id really like help

item.title: Environmental variables

the whole windows and computer is configured to spanish, its the spanish versionâ€¦so kinda problem there

item.title: Environmental variables

item.description:
@LARDI wrote:

Well i have just realized my computer is set up in Spanish, so for this reason, i feel like this is the reason my classpath and path did not work, since i believe the English words do not work for it, like PROGRAM FILES, is named Archivos de programa in Spanish, so could this be the reason why my compiler wont work? and because the compiler is set up to look for C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; not C:\Archivos de programa\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; ? idk if sum1 knows about this, but if u do, id really like help
